subject: Re: [sugar] datastore install patch
body:
Tomeu Vizoso wrote:
> Hi,
>
> this patch makes datastore to install the .service files so dbus can
> auto-start the services.
>
> Should be applied for people who update sugar-jhbuild and cannot start
> any activity.
>   

Please go ahead and check it in. Build must *always* work, we need to 
get a lot better about it.

Marco
